trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_001<tab>Oh, I like housing─that is to say, I <var 1A 02 /var>like<var 1A 01 /var> it. I roam this fair land─fairest!─touring all the adventurer settlements. You might say I'm a flatspotter. Or a house peeper.

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_100_001<tab>Oh, one of us, are you? A fellow house peeper, very <var 1A 02 /var>good<var 1A 01 /var>! You must talk to the resident caretakers then. Connections are everything in this...proclivity.

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_002<tab>That cove right there is where Rycharde Mistbeard came home to his hideout. Mmm, lore! And brine! This is Mist, <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> residential area for adventurers─and a fine piece of Limsa it is too.

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_003<tab>Ah, the Goblet! Now who doesn't want to drink from <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>, I ask. I was planning a trip to Ul'dah just to see this place, but plans kept getting pushed back. But finally, I'm here!

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_004<tab>Now, this one might be my favorite residential area right now. The Lavender Beds! Such a relaxing area, don't you think? I've had a rather stressful few years, to be honest. The quiet life in Gridania, among the trees... <sigh>

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_005<tab>Lest you wonder, Shirogane means platinum, and small wonder this place is named so. That pristine, glittering sand is a treat for eyes and feet alike. Truly a slice of Far Eastern paradise, this!

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_000_006<tab>I had heard the people of Ishgard sought assistance to rebuild in the wake of the Dragonsong War, but never did I expect they would accomplish all this, and so quickly! Indeed, it is the epitome of masonry.
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_000<tab>I say, is this your chocobo by any chance? He <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var>? Wonderful, wonderful!

TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_001<tab>The fellow wandered here a while ago, looking rather glum for having been separated from his <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>. I'm glad that you came by when you did─nothing warms the heart like a happy reunion!
TEXT_CMNDEFMRHOUSING_00140_MRHOUSING_004_002<tab>Your chocobo companion has been returned to you, and may once again be summoned to your side.
